mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( Select rownum rn , a.* From (select * from board order by b_num DESC) a ) WHERE rn between #{start} and #{end}
select nickname from memberInfo where nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.update: update board as bd, memberinfo as mb set bd.b_num=#{b_num}, bd.title=#{title}, bd.uploaddate=#{uploaddate}, bd.views=#{views}, mb.nickname=#{nickname} where bd.title=#{title}
